name: Switcheroo (Skill Card)
text:
Keith / Skill
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Skill Effect ]
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase.
Once per turn, you can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck, then draw 1 card, also flip this card over.
You can use this Skill up to twice per Duel.
